snippet: The gathering, which was expected to draw 60,000 people, was the largest evangelical Christian event in New York City since 2005.
abstract: Thousands gather on Central Park's Great Lawn for largest evangelical Christian gathering in New York City since 2005; event, expected to draw 60,000 people, features leading Argentine evangelical Christian leader Rev Luis Palau.
lead_paragraph: The gathering, which was expected to draw 60,000 people, was the largest evangelical Christian event in New York City since 2005.

headline.main: Thousands Gather at Evangelical Event in Central Park
headline.print_headline: Thousands of Faithful Gather at Revival Event
